name: The Purgatorial
description:
The Purgatorial is a top-down action game based around a seeded puzzle. Each run is unique and randomized, where you will need to explore and progress through 6 different stages before fighting a boss. 

Brute force between a fugue of reality and the paranormal or discover unique landmarks and uncover its secrets and backstories to guide you in this mystery. 

This game was made in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme "It is not real".

Controls: WASD: Move
Space: Dodge
LMB: Melee
RMB: Shoot
Scroll wheel: Zoom in/out
0: Restart run
9: Toggle cinema mode

Credits :
Assets, Music
